# AsVar

<div class="type-hierarchy"><strong>haxe.extern.AsVar</strong> (Abstract)</div>

If this type is used as an argument type, the compiler ensures that
argument expressions are bound to a local variable.

## Type Conversions

**From:**
- `haxe.extern.AsVar.T`

**To:**
- `haxe.extern.AsVar.T`

## Metadata

| Name | Parameters |
|------|------------|
| `:forward` | - |
| `:transitive` | - |
| `:semantics` | variable |
